equation.expression: Q^\pi(s,a) = \textbf{E} \left[ \sum_{h=0}^{\infty} \gamma^hr(s_h, a_h)|(s_0, a_0)=(s,a), a_h \sim \pi(s_h), s_{h+1} \sim P(\cdot |s_h,a_h) \right]

rich_text.plain_text: Q^\pi(s,a) = \textbf{E} \left[ \sum_{h=0}^{\infty} \gamma^hr(s_h, a_h)|(s_0, a_0)=(s,a), a_h \sim \pi(s_h), s_{h+1} \sim P(\cdot |s_h,a_h) \right]

text.content: For infinite horizon discounted MDP, there exists a deterministic stationary policy

rich_text.plain_text: For infinite horizon discounted MDP, there exists a deterministic stationary policy

equation.expression: \text{For any }V : S \rightarrow \R, \text{if } V(s) = \max_a \left[r(s,a) + \gamma \textbf{E}_{s'\sim P(\cdot|s,a)}V(s')\right] \text{ for all }s, \text{then } V(s) = V^*(s),\forall s
